name: It Was a Trap
description:
It Was a Trap

Is a top down action DEMO that was submitted as a Production course - Final project. 

This game was passionately developed by a group of wonderful and talented nerds. (Team members are in an attached image)

Setup

You play as a magician who must capture his bunnies that ran away from his hat in the middle of a show.

In order to do so, the magician goes backstage, and uses his traps to capture the bunnies, while also using his magic cards to protect himself from their attacks.

The Player cannot interact directly with the enemies and must think creatively how to use his weapons in order to advance.
